Class.name: Form.REST.Objects
Class.Description: Broker class to work with queries

Parameter.name: ALL
Parameter.Description: Query to return all availible information about form objects

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/:form/custom/:query" Method="GET" Call="getFormObjectsCustom"/> <Route Url="/:form/:query" Method="GET" Call="getFormObjects"/> </Routes>

Method.name: getFormObjects
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Info).formExistsStatus(class) return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc set sc = ..checkObjPermission(class, "R") return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc set sc = ..getBaseQuery(queryType, class, .queryBase) return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set table = $$$ClassSQLTable(class) set sql = queryBase _ table
set sc = ##class(Form.JSON.SQL).WriteJSONFromSQL(sql, class) return sc

Method.name: getBaseQuery
Method.Description:
Returns the part between SELECT and FORM (queryBase) based on queryType and target class Supported queryBase sources:
1. Uppercase parameter values defined in this class
2. ClassMethods, defined in this class with the name: queryQUERYTYPE

Method.name: queryINFO
getFormObjectsCustom
Method.Description: Get form objects by a custom query
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Info).formExistsStatus(class) return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc set sc = ..checkObjPermission(class, "R") return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set queryType = $ZCVT(queryType, "U")
if ##class(%Dictionary.MethodDefinition).IDKEYExists(class, "customquery" _ queryType) { set sql = $classmethod(class, "customquery" _ queryType) } else { set sc = $$$ERROR($$$GeneralError, "Custom query type " _ queryType _ " not found") }
return:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
set sc = ##class(Form.JSON.SQL).WriteJSONFromSQL(sql) return sc
